TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PowerRequestType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Used to specify what kind of power will be reserved using the IOUSBDevice RequestExtraPower and ReturnExtraPower APIs.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.PowerRequestType DuringSleep = unsigned int8(0)

Docs.summary: The power is to be used during sleep.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.PowerRequestType DuringWake = unsigned int8(1)

Docs.summary: The power is to be used while the system is awake (i.e not sleeping)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.PowerRequestType DuringWakeRevocable = unsigned int8(6)

Docs.summary: The power is to be used while the system is awake (i.e not sleeping), but can be taken away (via the RequestWakeRelease message). The system can then allocate that extra power to another device.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.PowerRequestType DuringWakeUSB3 = unsigned int8(7)

Docs.summary: This is used by the USB stack to allocate the 400mA extra for USB3, above the 500ma allocated by USB2

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.PowerRequestType RequestSleepReallocate = unsigned int8(5)

Docs.summary: When used with ReturnExtraPower(), it will send a message to all devices indicating that they can ask for more sleep power, as some device has released it.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.PowerRequestType RequestSleepRelease = unsigned int8(3)

Docs.summary: When used with ReturnExtraPower(), it will send a message to all devices to return any sleep power if possible.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.PowerRequestType RequestWakeReallocate = unsigned int8(4)

Docs.summary: When used with ReturnExtraPower(), it will send a message to all devices indicating that they can ask for more wake power, as some device has released it.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoMac.IOKit.USB.PowerRequestType RequestWakeRelease = unsigned int8(2)

Docs.summary: When used with ReturnExtraPower(), it will send a message to all devices to return any extra wake power if possible.
